constraints.name: cyclic_ordering
constraints.description: 元素按循环顺序排列（从1到x再回到1）

constraints.name: monotonic_increasing
constraints.description: 已知元素必须保持非递减顺序
constraints.formal: For all i < j, if v[i] > 0 and v[j] > 0, then v[i] <= v[j]

constraints.name: fixed_start_value
constraints.description: 序列的第一个元素固定为1

constraints.name: subset_constraint
constraints.description: 所有非零元素的值必须在1到k之间
constraints.formal: For all i, if v[i] > 0, then 1 <= v[i] <= k
